output_list.criticism: The TileClaimed event has an integer overflow, allowing the owner to set the balance of the tiles to any value. This can be exploited to manipulate the game outcome and potentially result in loss of money.

The random number generator in the Tiles contract is set to a fixed seed, meaning that the generated random numbers will always be the same. This can be misused to set the balance of the tiles to any value, potentially resulting in loss of money.

The Tiles contract allows only the owner to set the game cost, meaning that the owner has full control over the game. This can be misused to set the balance of the tiles to any value, potentially resulting in loss of money.
